channel.title: How do i change my characters look?
channel.description:
How do I change my characters look. I don't see the option in the actual game, so I go to file, "character" and I see this:
[LOOK] character-look = 0 0 character-look = 1 7 character-look = 2 6 character-look = 3 7 character-look = 4 3 character-look = 5 0
When I try and change it and compile then see the appearance, sometimes it will say im logged in until I change it back.
It aslo doesn't seem like it saves the changes when it works(Everything else so far compiles fine)
PLEASE HELP!

item.title: How do i change my characters look?

item.title: How do i change my characters look?
item.dc:creator: @Thecheeseman11 Thecheeseman11
item.description:
@Thecheeseman11 wrote:

How do I change my characters look. I don’t see the option in the actual game, so I go to file, “character” and I see this:

[LOOK]
character-look = 0 0
character-look = 1 7
character-look = 2 6
character-look = 3 7
character-look = 4 3
character-look = 5 0

When I try and change it and compile then see the appearance, sometimes it will say im logged in until I change it back.

It aslo doesn’t seem like it saves the changes when it works(Everything else so far compiles fine)

PLEASE HELP!
